column2: DCs Swamp Creatures Want Biden to Restore Crony Corrupt Anti-America ‘Normalcy’
column5: Next Tuesday is allegedly election day. I say allegedly – because more than sixty million people will have by then already voted. More than thirty million had voted prior to the cataclysmically bad revelations began pouring forth from the laptop computer of the son of Democrat presidential candidate Joe Biden. Which have revealed with moral certitude that Biden has spent his half century in DC selling America by the pound – for billions of personal familial dollars. A fact I would have liked those thirty or so million people to have known prior to their casting their ballots. Which is why I have said from its inception: Early voting is titanically stupid. It is yet another corruption of the very rational reasonable and excellent system our Founding Fathers had established for us. DC has spent decades executing millions of these assaults on what was once a great nation. Until nearly all that was left – was a bunch of simple simpleton self-dealing Joe Bidens and the rot they had wrought. In oh-so-many-ways the inordinately corrupt Biden is the perfect anti-America anti-candidate to incumbent Republican Donald Trump. Trump was a career non-politician.  Who ran to save us from the career politicians and the creeping consuming heinousness they have grown around themselves. And after four years of Trump being the bull busting up DCs corrupt China shoppe – Corrupt DC nominates to stop him…its prototypical poster child. Biden Campaigning on ‘Return to Normalcy’ We shouldn’t want any part of their “normalcy.” Their “normalcy” – is finishing once and for all their murder of the very rational reasonable and excellent system our Founding Fathers had established for us. Biden is a 47-year DC careerist non-entity – who embodies everything that is wrong with the cartel Trump is attempting to break up. Biden’s been here half a century – and what little he’s accomplished for the country has been terrible.  Perhaps because he’s been too busy illegally over-accomplishing for himself by way of his complicit family members. The Biden Crime Family has raked in billions from globalist corporations and foreign governments and entities.  And all it took was an ongoing rolling sell-out of the country Biden purported to represent. International companies – working with countries like Communist China Mexico and many many others – wanted to steal Capitalism from the United States.  Biden and his DC ilk butchered it – and sold it off like so many pounds of beef. DC loves Socialism.  They’ve spent the last several decades using Socialism to drive out our Capitalism – so they could then sell it piecemeal to the rest of the planet. Nature abhors a vacuum.  And DC loves Socialism.  So DC has spent the last several decades filling the Capitalism void they themselves created with Socialism – with more and more Socialism. Despite DCs best efforts occasionally new Capitalism shoots manage to break through America’s stony ground.  And then DCs Swamp Creatures quickly look to kill it. Almost certainly the largest recent breakthrough – has been the Internet.  What began a quarter century ago as a doddering dial-up novelty – has bloomed into one-seventh of our entire national economy. And as soon as DCs Swamp Creatures realized the Internet’s potency – they began looking to end it. Born was the awfulness that is Network Neutrality.  Invented to end the Capitalism Internet – and leave us with Socialism government-only Internet. How do we know this?  They told us: “(T)he ultimate goal is to get rid of the media capitalists in the phone and cable companies and to divest them from control.” Net Neutrality is: “(A) part of (t)his Socialist (re)construction project: ‘There is no real answer but to remove brick by brick the capitalist system itself rebuilding the entire society on socialist principles.’” Despite DCs best efforts the Internet has mostly remained out-from-under DCs Socialist hobnailed boot.  Which is precisely why it has blossomed so successfully and beautifully. By “normalcy” DCs Swamp Creatures mean Socialism.  Any remaining recalcitrant strands of Capitalism – are “abnormal.”  And must be contorted into Socialist “normalcy.” The Internet must be made to comply. Down with Capitalism Internet.  Viva Socialism Government-Only Internet. Right Swamp Creature Biden? Biden’s Grand Plan for the Internet: Restore Net Neutrality Create Municipal Broadband: “If elected president Joe Biden has big plans….Biden aims to restore net neutrality rules and get rid of laws that block municipal broadband or internet access that’s provided fully or partially by local governments. He outlined the plan in a task force document drafted with Bernie Sanders.” His Internet plan co-author – is Vermont Senator Bernie Sanders.  As in self-avowed Socialist Bernie Sanders.  The guy who honeymooned in the Soviet Union. Any questions? You can have them answered November 3rd. Or before I guess. Or for weeks after apparently.
